ja.burhanrashid52.photoeditor

Class BrushDrawingView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • ja.burhanrashid52.photoeditor.BrushDrawingView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class BrushDrawingView
extends android.view.View

    This is custom drawing view used to do painting on user touch events it it will paint on canvas as per attributes provided to the paint

    Since:
    12/1/18
